items.summary: Fix the "move to mission" flow so that when a user moves items from a folder to a mission, the moved files (including link-items stored as FileMetadata) appear in the target mission immediately and are removed from the source folder immediately, without requiring a manual refresh or navigation away/back.

Fix the "move to mission" flow so that when a user moves notes from a folder to a mission, the moved notes appear in the target mission immediately and are removed from the source folder immediately, without requiring a manual refresh or navigation away/back.

Ensure backend move operations correctly detach moved items from folders when moving them to missions: (a) files/links moved to a mission must have folderId cleared and missionId set, and (b) notes moved to a mission must have folderId cleared and missionId set (and any location/fileLocation fields updated consistently if used by the app).
